meanings.definition: A short journey or trip, especially for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: During the school break, we went on exciting excursions to the park.
meanings.sent2: Family excursions to the beach are always fun and relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The excursions to the ice cream shop were the highlight of the summer.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took wild excursions into the world of fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hot air balloon excursions left a lasting impression on the children.

meanings.definition: A deviation from a regular course or standard.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected excursions in the experiment led to interesting results.
meanings.sent2: The company's financial excursions raised concerns among investors.
meanings.sent3: His excursions from the usual routine always kept things interesting.
meanings.sent4: The excursions from tradition sparked a wave of creativity in the community.
meanings.sent5: The excursions from reality in the movie created a mind-bending experience for the audience.
